snippet.title: BIKMIN 269 - OFFICIAL RELEASE + DOWNLOAD
snippet.description:
Bikmin 269 is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and all new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains a new story with characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, a little bit memey, or just not correct. With over 90 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh this mod is essentially a new game. This mod is not meant to be taken too seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh and creative for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

Here's the link the reveal trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jdP8xESQ-4Q

For more information on how to set up the mod and play it you can read the included "README.txt" file.

If you have any questions, or concerns then please join this discord server and ask for help!
Link: https://discord.gg/q9kWEe7TBd

Also, maybe follow my twitter for more random Pikmin and/or funny content if you're into that kind of thing https://twitter.com/Rheycore

Here is the download link for the mod, it can primarily be played on Dolphin as of right now, additional installation instructions are included in the README.txt!

Download Link: mega.nz/file/S4oxiCjb#9YbhcaERWPLql1s_Gp-WKPCeC11lj75rZrxLbVMgOuI

The password for the .rar file is "keY".
